title: Stuff of Nightmares: 5 Short Stories to help you sleep...
description: For lovers of the paranormal and the darker side of life, these fictional short stories are from the mind of a real paranormal investigator. Dark, macabre and compelling, they make an excellent bedtime read especially for nights with a full moon....Take a walk on the dark side but don't forget to look over your shoulder...This horror anthology is made up of paranormal fiction in the form of short stories.
author: Kim O'Shea
